Transmission - OpenVPN.description:
OCI container running Transmission torrent client with Web-UI while connecting to OpenVPN.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Transmission - OpenVPN.more_info: See the container's documentation for a list of included VPN provider profiles. If your provider isn't included, set it up as a custom provider, by putting the relevant files in the Custom profile share.

/data.description: Share for data files, including downloads.
/data.label: Data Storage [e.g. transmission-data]

/etc/openvpn/custom.description: Share for custom OpenVPN profile files. This can be an empty share if you use one of the included provider profiles.
/etc/openvpn/custom.label: OpenVPN config [e.g. ovpn-config]

LOCAL_NETWORK.description: IP range(s) (in CIDR notation) to consider 'local'; this range is added to the routing so that the Web-UI can be used. Multiple networks can be specified, comma-separated.
LOCAL_NETWORK.label: LOCAL_NETWORK [e.g. 192.168.0.0/24]

TRANSMISSION_WEB_UI.description: Alternative Web-UI to use; other options are: combustion, kettu, transmission-web-control, flood-for-transmission, shift, and transmissionic.
TRANSMISSION_WEB_UI.label: TRANSMISSION_WEB_UI [e.g. 'default']
